author: jleroux
msg: 1.5.2 is a maintenance release to fix the security issue described in CVE-2010-1632 as well as an XSS vulnerability in the admin console and some other minor issues. It also upgrades Axiom to version 1.2.9.

author: hwright
msg: Remove the 1.6.x-issue3648 branch, reintegrated in r1001807.

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3648 '2-URL merges incorrectly reverse-merge mergeinfo for
Prevents 2-URL merges from removing valid mergeinfo which can lead
to spurious conflicts on subsequent merges.
Drift between trunk and 1.6.x, necessitated a backport branch.
r958024 is a new test for the issue, r961055 is the fix, and r964167
is a comment tweak to the new test.

author: hindessm
msg: Apply fix for HARMONY-6406 (Combination of multiply and compareTo BigDecimal methods returns unexpected result)
